title: Blush & Ivory Patchwork Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's midi dress combining blush pink and ivory panels in a patchwork design, short puff sleeves, V-neckline, fit-and-flare silhouette, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
style_fit: tailored at waist with flared skirt
techpack: Midi dress with alternating blush pink and ivory panels in patchwork layout, short puff sleeves gathered at cuff, V-neckline with facing, fitted bodice with darts, flared skirt panels, invisible zipper at center back, side seam pockets, contrast topstitching along panel seams.
provenance: Designed by combining trending pink and white color palette inspired by contemporary patchwork and fit-and-flare silhouettes from example references.
design_text:
Blush & Ivory Patchwork Midi Dress (PW001)
Colors: blush pink, ivory white
Fabrics: lightweight cotton, linen blend
Prints/Patterns: patchwork, solid color blocks
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: fit-and-flare
Sleeves: short puff sleeves
Neckline: V-neck
Length: midi
Style / Fit: t, a, i, l, o, r, e, d,  , a, t,  , w, a, i, s, t,  , w, i, t, h,  , f, l, a, r, e, d,  , s, k, i, r, t
Trims & details: contrast topstitching, side seam pockets, invisible back zipper
Techpack: available
